title: Eric's Test Grant
body:
> by 0x9982b469910c2ee2ea566dcfcc250cdd34056397 (MrEric)

Should the following Tier 1: a one-time payment of $500 - $1500 USD in MANA grant in the Community category be approved?

## Abstract

yay


## Grant size

1 MANA

## Beneficiary address

0x9982b469910c2Ee2EA566dCfCc250CDD34056397

## Description

Fund MyProject

Describe the roadmap of your project, making sure to include any relevant milestones that the community should be aware of and how you will share progress you have made.
